name: The Haunting of the Robot Custodian!
name_original: The Haunting of the Robot Custodian!
description:
STORY

Zombies have risen, and they're hungry for robot brains! Luckily, they're weak to your robo-custodian cleaning gun...but the trigger is broken. Maybe if you overload it with detergent cartridges, it would all spray out at once...

Good luck, and try to get a high score!

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys or WASD to move. Move the mouse to aim (cursor must be within the game window). If your character stops moving, click on the game window. 

CREDITS

All sprites and fonts courtesy of Kenney Assets. Game design, programming, audio, title art etc. by Dan McAlister.

MADE FOR GMTK GAME JAM 2020

The theme for the jam was "Out of Control." This is a game where you can't control when your gun fires.
